page.title: 19LOCAL SERVICES/REETH
page.content: {FIRE BRIGADE:-}The fire brigade is manned by voluntary help,by 12 men who are summoned by a radio alerter.The Brigade is 47 yrs. old and {Tom Guy} has been with it for 29 years. They have a practice every Thursday nightand cover the area from Ellerton up to the County Boundaries. {THE POLICE:- Police Constable {Creswell}has been here about 2 years and he lives in the Police House.He drives about 50 mls a day on duty with the same territory as the Fire Brigade.He is on the look out for poachers and thieves but often has to protect the Home Secretary when he is at home. {REETH COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL:-}The school has about 70 children from rising 5 up to 11 years.There are 3 full time teachers(including the head) and a part timer.There is a kitchen.
